name: Peng Cheng 0003
content: Home - Peng Cheng Home | Peng Cheng Peng ChengResearcher in Spatial Intelligence. Follow Shanghai, China Tongji University Email Github arXiv dblp Google Scholar ORCIDI am a Researcher in the School of Computer Science and Technology at Tongji University. I was a Junior Researcher in the School of Software Engineering at East China Normal University from March 2019 to January 2025. I received my BS and master degrees at Xi’an Jiaotong Univeristy in 2012 and 2014. I received my Ph.D. degree in Computer Science and Engineering, supervised by Prof. Lei Chen at Hong Kong University of Science and Technology in 2017. Then I worked with Prof. Lei Chen as a Post-Doc from October 2017 to March 2019.CVShort biographyIn a nutshell2025–now: Researcher, Tongji University, Shanghai, China2019–2025: Junior Researcher, East China Normal University, Shanghai, China2014–2019: Ph.D & Post-Doc, HKUST, HK SAR, China. Supervisor: Lei Chen2012–2014: M.S., Xi’an Jiaotong University, Xi’an, China2008–2012: B.S., Xi’an Jiaotong University, Xi’an, ChinaContact Room 332, Jishi Building, 4800 Cao'an Road, Jiading District, Shanghai, ChinaShow in Google Maps
